locations.name: Lisbon
locations.description: Portugal's vibrant capital city, known for its historic neighborhoods like Alfama, cultural richness, Fado music, viewpoints ('miradouros'), and renowned culinary scene.

locations.name: Comporta
locations.description: An effortlessly chic coastal enclave south of Lisbon, recognized for its laid-back luxury, stunning beaches, dunes, pine forests, rice paddies, and relaxed sophistication.
